resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

jorgecarleitao commented on a change in pull request #9017:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9017#discussion_r548950578



##########
File path: rust/arrow/src/array/builder.rs
##########
@@ -86,20 +80,13 @@ pub(crate) fn builder_to_mutable_buffer<T: ArrowPrimitiveType>(
 /// # }
 /// ```
 #[derive(Debug)]
-pub struct BufferBuilder<T: ArrowPrimitiveType> {
+pub struct BufferBuilder<T: ArrowNativeType> {

Review comment:
       This change was motivated by `T` not really requiring `ArrowPrimitiveType`, only `ArrowNativeType`.

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
The trait is no longer used, as we completely split the build of boolean and non-boolean buffers, and the purpose of that trait was to support multiple implementations of the buffer building.

 

This trait also has `Result` for infallible methods.
